item.title: Hugo theme Simple Frame
item.description: Simple Frame is a lightweight and minimal Hugo theme designed for speed, clarity, and ease of use. Itâ€™s ideal for bloggers, developers, and writers who prefer clean layouts and distraction-free content. The theme supports dark mode, is mobile-friendly, and easy to customize with minimal CSS.
